# Find Youngest User

Write a SQL query to find the name and age of the youngest user.

### Table Schema
| Column | Type    | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| id     | INTEGER | Primary Key |
| name   | TEXT    | User Name   |
| age    | INTEGER | User Age    |

### Example
**Input:**
```
+----+-------+-----+
| id | name  | age |
+----+-------+-----+
| 1  | Alice | 30  |
| 2  | Bob   | 20  |
| 3  | Charlie| 35 |
+----+-------+-----+
```

**Output:**
```
+-------+-----+
| name  | age |
+-------+-----+
| Bob   | 20  |
+-------+-----+
```

testCases.solutionSql: SELECT name, age FROM users ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT name, age FROM users ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 1;
